articles.title: Meeting of Koreans in Japan Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Meeting of Koreans in Japan Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il took place at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo of Japan on Feb. 15.
					 Present there were Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairpersons Nam Sung U, Pae Ik Ju, Pae Jin Gu and Kang Chu Ryon of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon Hong In Hum, President of Korean University Jang Pyong Thae, advisers and directors of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, the director of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, chairpersons of the Chongryon headquarters in Kanto area and others.
					
					 Ho Jong Man made a report at the meeting.
					
					 The reporter praised Kim Jong Il as the peerless patriot and kind-hearted leader of the people who laid an eternal foundation for the building of a powerful socialist nation and the country's prosperity by making forced march of field guidance all his life after being born as the son of the anti-Japanese guerrillas on Mt Paektu, sacred mountain of revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Il had wisely led Chongryon and the movement of Koreans in Japan along the road of Juche and showed deep love and solicitude for the happiness of the Koreans in Japan and the bright future of posterity, the reporter said.
					
					 The reporter stressed that all the Chongryon officials and compatriots should intensify the movement of Koreans in Japan, full of confidence and optimism about victory, cherishing deep the great leaders' undying feats for nation-building and the greatness of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is fully displaying the might of Juche Korea as a politico-ideological and military power all over the world.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was read out at the meeting.
					
					 Meanwhile, similar celebration meetings were held at the headquarters of Chongryon across Japan.

articles.title: Lecture in Japan Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Lecture in Japan Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- A lecture of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) was given at the Korean Hall in Tokyo, Japan on Feb. 12 to celebrate the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairpersons of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, the chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon, officials of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, leading officials of Chongryon organizations and business groups and officials of Chongryon headquarters in Kanto area.
					
					 Shown at the lecture meeting was a Korean documentary "Great Change", Part 2 of "Peerlessly Great Man Who Glorified Juche Era".
					
					 Then the participants heard a recorded lecture "Whole Life of Noble Devotion".
					
					 The lecture helped recollect the whole life of Kim Jong Il who had devotedly worked for the country and the people with the warmest love.

articles.title: Art Performance of Koreans in Japan Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Art Performance of Koreans in Japan Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- An art performance of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was given at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo of Japan on February 15.
					 Watching the performance were Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairpersons Nam Sung U, Pae Ik Ju, Pae Jin Gu and Kang Chu Ryon of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon Hong In Hum, advisers and directors of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, the director of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, leading officials of Chongryon organizations and business groups, chairpersons of the Chongryon headquarters in Kanto area and other Chongryon officials, compatriots and teaching staff and students of Korean University.
					
					 Taking part in the performance were artistes of the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe of Chongryon, women's union members and students of Korean University.
					
					 The number of the performance, which began with symphony orchestra "Patriotic Song", included chorus immortal revolutionary paean "Song of General Kim Jong Il" and Jangsaenap instrumental solo "Attraction and Reverence".
					
					 The performers well represented the world of deep yearnings of Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Female chorus "Voice of My Heart" and male chorus "We Are Mallima Riders" portrayed well the will of the Koreans in Japan to keep pace with the dynamic advance of the homeland, with boundless reverence for respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Vicious Farce of Trump Group
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Vicious Farce of Trump Group
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The Trump group has become extremely embarrassed by the atmosphere for inter-Korean reconciliation daily mounting as occasioned by the 23rd Winter Olympics.
					 A typical example is the "possibility of defection" of our personnel dispatched to the south which is given much publicity through U.S. media.
					
					 CNN and CBS of the U.S. reported that more than 500 north Koreans are staying in south Korea, "better-off and free", and the north side authorities are closely monitoring them because of the possibility of their "defection" during the Olympics.
					
					 They even said that north Korean athletes attempted "defection" in the middle of international games in the past, adding if the similar thing happens, the north can not but be embarrassed and the south side authorities may be put in an awkward situation.
					
					 By putting into use the defectors of sportsperson and artiste origin, they went vicious to shake the pure minds of our people through such rhetoric as "round-the-clock surveillance" and "the first look at the rich and democratic neighbor".
					
					 The rubbish made by CNN and CBS is a hideous anti-DPRK farce being orchestrated at the instruction and under the manipulation by the Trump group including the Central Intelligence Agency, upset by the present north-south relations wrapped by enthusiasm for reconciliation and unity.
					
					 In his recent "state of the union address", Trump viciously slandered the DPRK while raising "human rights issue". Not content with it, he met "defectors from the north", and the vice-president visiting south Korea took human scum to the "Warship Cheonan Memorial" where he made vituperation against the DPRK, shocking the world.
					
					 The wild act of the Trump group keen on turning the Olympics, symbol of peace, into a theatre for confrontation with the DPRK would only reveal its dirty nature as the kingpin of plot-breeding.
					
					 The Trump group bluffed about "calm before storm" and "fire and fury". Now it is using such human scum for the petty scheme.
					
					 Tragic is that the Trump group is going reckless, not realizing the transparent faith of the Korean people in socialism which can never be imitated, their mental power based on single-minded unity and the Koreans' strong desire for improved north-south ties and reunification.
					
					 The Trump group had better not exhaust themselves, giving up the pipe dream of "collapse of the system in the north" which can never come true.
					
					 It has to bear in mind that the south Koreans and all other Koreans see through the dirty nature of the U.S. as a cancer-like entity standing in the way of peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula in its perverse and obstructive acts of chilling the efforts for the improvement of the north-south ties.
					
					 The U.S. must no longer go arrogant to interfere in the internal affairs of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Key to Mending Inter-Korean Relations Is National Independence: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Key to Mending Inter-Korean Relations Is National Independence: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The anti-reunification conservative forces of south Korea are running wild with confrontation ruckus and the U.S. is freaking out to block the climate of reconciliation and peace between the north and the south being created on the Korean peninsula and to realize its ambition to strangle the DPRK, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in an article.
					 But, such vicious obstructive moves can never reverse the trend of the times heading towards the improvement of inter-Korean relations and the independent reunification, the article stresses, adding:
					
					 What is all the more important in repairing the inter-Korean relations and achieving national unity and reunification is to solve any issue regarding the inter-Korean relations on the basis of the firm stand of national independence, not depending upon outsiders, now that the U.S. and the south Korean conservative forces' moves to hamper reunification have reached the zenith.
					
					 Independence is a way for improvement of inter-Korean relations, peace and reunification, whereas dependence on the outsiders is the apple of discord that stokes mistrust and standoff between the fellow countrymen and increases the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 The relations between the north and the south were driven into the worst state of catastrophe during the conservative regime in south Korea. It's because the conservative ruling forces had only indulged in sycophancy and treachery and standoff with fellow countrymen, crying out for "priority to the relations" and "strengthened alliance" with the U.S.
					
					 Nine-year tenure of office by the conservatives provided a serious lesson that the inter-Korean relations will not evade doom if they turn their faces away from the principle of By Our Nation Itself and run amuck in confrontation with fellow countrymen by cooperating with and throwing in their lot with the outside forces.
					
					 A fundamental key to mending the inter-Korean relations is to solve all issues under the unfurled banner of national independence.
					
					 The anti-reunification forces at home and abroad still present a vicious challenge but no ordeals and difficulties can shake the will of the Korean nation desiring the improved north-south relations and the country's reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Mocks Abe's Visit to S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Mocks Abe's Visit to S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary ridicules Japanese Prime Minster Abe for laying bare his humiliating and crude temper during the two day and one night-trip to south Korea which he made under the pretext of attending the opening ceremony of the 23rd Winter Olympics.
					 Abe, far from making an apology and paying the minimum reparations for the past crimes, crossed over the Korean strait, being panicked by the thaw in the inter-Korean relations. He had gone wild to cast a chill over the hard-won climate of reconciliation between the fellow countrymen. He deserves the call, a cheeky self-invited guest, says the commentary, and goes on:
					
					 The Abe clique may groan about the climate of peace on the Korean peninsula, complaining that it makes them feel like sitting on a cushion of thorn. However, the trend of the times will make its way, mocking at the political mice of the island nation.
					
					 Abe, who attended the opening ceremony to spoil other's feast, only failed and went back to his den, empty-handed and crestfallen. He must stop going mischievous and listen carefully to the shout of peace resounding throughout the Korean peninsula.
					
					 He should cool his heated ambition of militarism and think twice why the whole world is calling the Japanese politicians including Abe political dwarfs, why the Korean nation's grudge against Japan knows no end even after the lapse of decades and why they only get the cold shoulder and hatred no matter how much money they spend here and there.
					
					 Japan must collect itself, away from the ambition of reinvasion, and meditate on the way of guaranteeing the genuine security of the Japanese archipelago under the present situation where the strategic landscape of Asia-Pacific has undergone a dramatic change along with the DPRK's accomplishment of its great historic cause of perfecting the state nuclear force.
					
					 The sooner the reflection and awareness, the better the result.

articles.title: Minju Joson Condemns Japan's Moves to Become Military Power
articles.content:
Minju Joson Condemns Japan's Moves to Become Military Power
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Japanese Prime Minister Abe at the recent full-dress session of the House of Representatives, in reference to the introduction of long-range cruise missile capable of attacking enemy bases, said "it does not stand to reason to assert that the missile is the weapon whose possession is not allowed under constitution".
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Sunday says his remarks smack of the militarist frenzy to arm the "Self-Defense Forces" with sophisticated war means and materialize the ambition for overseas expansion.
					
					 Japan finds the way for overseas aggression in turning the country into a military power, the news analyst notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is now about to completely disregard the "pacifist constitution" after its all-out push for emerging as a military power even by interpreting the constitution in its interests for the arms buildup, 
					
					 With the SDF ready to fight an aggression war against other countries, the Japanese reactionaries aim to ensure more active military advance of the forces and create conditions favorable for aggression wars.
					
					 Japan is gnashing its teeth to avenge its defeat in the past war. It is clear that if it launches overseas aggression again, the whole world, to say nothing of the Asian countries, will meet horrible disaster.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Flayed by Public at Home
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Flayed by Public at Home
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Organizations of various circles in south Korea including the Confederation of Trade Unions on Feb. 14 held a press conference at the plaza near Seoul Railway Station to denounce the authorities for snubbing the mindset of candlelight demonstrators, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 A press release, read out at the conference, called for a stronger campaign for eradication of the evils, respect for labor, equitable society and peaceful Korean peninsula, saying that the candlelight resistance has not yet ended.

articles.title: 70th Birthday of KPA Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
70th Birthday of KPA Celebrated Abroad
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Celebration meetings, lectures, book exhibitions and film shows took place in Poland, Bangladesh and Nigeria between Jan. 25 and Feb. 7 to mark the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and books introducing the achievements made by the DPRK army and people in building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 A Korean film dealing with the invincible might of the KPA was shown.
					
					 Speakers at the events, including the honorary chairman of the Tradition Association of the Polish People's Army, said that the KPA is a world-level formidable army possessed of nuclear weapons and that nuclear force is the best means for national security. The Korean people have keenly realized through their historical experience that it is impossible to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation without tremendous military force, they added.
					
					 Noting that many military experts of the world are analyzing the factors by which the KPA has demonstrated its might as an invincible army, the chairman of a branch of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea said:
					
					 The first factor is that the KPA is the army strong in mental power.
					
					 The next is that the KPA is equipped with ultra-modern military hardware and outstanding strategy, tactics and war methods.
					
					 The most important factor making the KPA display its might as the ever-victorious revolutionary armed forces is that it has had the rare brilliant commanders as its Supreme Commander.
					
					 The participants in the events held in Nigeria lauded the exploits of the great leaders for strengthening of the military power, recalling that the KPA, the regular revolutionary armed forces which inherited the tradition of the anti-Japanese guerillas, was founded in the DPRK on Feb. 8, 1948.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Mostafa Jamal Haider, secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party, issued a statement on Feb. 4 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il is the great leader who ardently loved the people.
					
					 He regarded the people as the most precious being in the world and as his teacher and made boundless devotion to them.
					
					 He signally bolstered up the country's military capabilities and defended the people's safety from the U.S. nuclear war threat and proudly turned the DPRK into a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 Under his wise guidance, the DPRK demonstrated its might as the socialist state centered on the popular masses, braving all trials and difficulties.
					
					 His noble image as the genuine leader of the people will be always kept in the minds of the Korean people and the world progressives.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Printed in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Printed in Indonesia
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in booklet at the Hekadaha Adicitra Publishing House of Indonesia on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The work, published on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation is a history which clearly proved the immovable truth that each country and nation can defend their dignity and guarantee their prosperity only when they have an outstanding leader.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for glorifying the dignity of the DPRK for all ages and successfully accomplishing the cause of building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Jan. 31.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la artimana absurda de la banda de Trump
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la artimana absurda de la banda de Trump
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- La banda de Trump esta muy aturdida ante el ambiente de reconciliacion entre el Norte y Sur de Corea que se aumenta mas con motivo de los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales.
					Lo muestran sus viles artimanas recientes. Estos dias, los medios norteamericanos de prensa divulgan las intrigantes opiniones publicas de la "posibilidad de fuga" de los miembros de la RPDC, enviados al Sur de Corea.
					
					Por ejemplo, las radios norteamericanas CNN y CBS transmitieron el pasado dia 10 los disparates de que mas de 500 miembros del Norte de Corea estan en el "Sur de Corea, vecino rico y libre mas que el Norte" y que ellos estan bajo la vigilancia rigurosa de las autoridades norcoreanas por la posibilidad de "fugarse del Norte" durante el periodo de la olimpiada.
					
					Cacarearon que en el pasado tambien unos deportistas norcoreanos intentaron la "fuga" en medio de las competencias internacionales y que si se repite tal caso en la presenta cita el Norte se vera perplejo y, al mismo tiempo, las autoridades surcoreanas se pondran en la situacion embarazosa.
					
					Para colmo, a fin de atentar el alma puro de los miembros de nuestros grupos presento ante la prensa hasta los basureros humanos con origenes deportistas y artistas norcoreanos hablando de que "vigilan en 24 horas" y "vieron directamente el vecino rico y democratico" movilizando 
					
					No hay duda de que tales sofisterias de CNN y CBS devienen una farsa intrigante contra la RPDC, guiada por el control e incitacion de la banda de Trump como la Agencia Central de Inteligencia que esta aturdida por el ambiente presente de relaciones intercoreanas por la reconciliacion y unidad de nacion coreana. 
					
					En su reciente mensaje de Ano Nuevo, Trump denigro atrozmente la RPDC con el problema de "DDHH" y se porto como loco encontrandose con los "fugitivos norcoreanos". Tambien, el vicepresidente estadounidense Pence que visito al Sur de Corea, echo maldiciones contra la RPDC recorriendo el "Casa Memorial de Buque Cheonan" junto con las escorias humanas que traicionaron a la RPDC.
					
					La locura de la banda de Trump que actuo para convertir la olimpiada, simbolo de la paz, en el lugar de confrontacion fratricida, revela el sucio aspecto del rey de las conspiraciones y los complots.
					
					Es muy pobre la situacion de la banda de Trump que al cabo de dar fanfarronadas hablando de "en visperas de la tempestad" o "fuego y colera", recurre ahora a las artimanas viles movilizando hasta las escorias humanas.
					
					La tragedia reside en que la banda de Trump actua imprudentemente todavia sin ver la conviccion firme del pueblo coreano en el socialismo, su poderio espiritual basado en la unidad monolitica y la fuerte aspiracion de la nacion coreana a la mejora de relaciones y reunificacion entre el Norte y el Sur.
					
					La banda de Trump debe abandonar su sueno absurdo del "derrumbamiento del sistema del Norte de Corea" que no puede ser logrado jamas.
					
					Y tiene que conocer bien que cuanto mas EE.UU. hace maniobras para impedir la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas tanto mas los coreanos incluyendo surcoreanos entenderan mejor la mala naturaleza de EE.UU., ser canceroso de la paz y reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					EE.UU. no debe intervenir mas en los asuntos internos de la nacion coreana.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena la conducta de Abe
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena la conducta de Abe
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- El premier japones Abe que visito al Sur de Corea bajo el rotulo de la participacion en el acto inaugural de los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales, fue objeto de burlas de todo el mundo por sus actos viles y absurdos revelados durante una noche y 2 dias de su permanencia.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de hoy y prosigue:
					
					En vez de hacer disculpas e indemnizacion ante el pueblo coreano por el pasado de Japon lleno de crimenes, Abe se sintio muy inquietado ante el ambiente de reconciliacion entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea y viajo para echarle agua fria a este exito de los coreanos creado dificilmente. 
					
					Se puede calificarlo del huesped no deseado.  
					
					La corriente avanzara por su via dando espalda a los enanos politicos del pais isleno que se sienten muy impacientes ante la creacion del ambiente de paz en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Abe que regreso a su casa sin lograr nada de su objeto tiene que calmarse y prestar oidos a la demanda de paz en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Y necesita enfriar su ambicion militarista y reflexionarse.
					
					?Por que todo el mundo califica de enanos politicos a Abe y otros politiqueros japoneses?, ?por que no desaparece el rencor de los coreanos contra Japon pese a que paso mucho tiempo?, ?por que Japon es objeto del tratamiento frio y rechazo en todo el mundo aunque gasta mucho dinero?
					
					Japon debe abandonar su ambicion de reagresion y pensar profundamente en el metodo para garantizar su seguridad verdadera conforme a la situacion en que se cambio fundamentalmente la posicion estrategica de la region de Asia-Pacifico gracias al logro de la gran causa historica del perfeccionamiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado de la RPDC.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena las maniobras de Japon por la conversion en potencia militar
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena las maniobras de Japon por la conversion en potencia militar
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- Al referir a la introduccion de misiles cruceros de larga distancia capaz de atacar las bases enemigas en una reciente reunion principal de la camara de representantes, el premier japones Abe pronuncio que "es injusta la insistencia de que ellos son las armas cuya posesion no se permite por la Constitucion".
					Esta pronunciacion de Abe contiene el fanatismo militarista para armar con los equipos sofisticados las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon para lograr a toda costa la ambicion de expansion al exterior.
					
					Asi revela el rotativo Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este domingo y continua como sigue:
					
					Japon esta buscando la salida para la agresion a otros paises en la conversion de su pais en potencia militar.
					
					Japon ha venido dando acicate a las maniobras por su conversion en la potencia militar analizando a su gusto la "Constitucion" por el aumento militarista y ahora trata de abandonar completamente hasta la "Constitucion Pacifica".
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses quieren crear las condiciones favorables a la guerra agresiva haciendo mas activamente la participacion militar puesto que sus "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" estan dispuestas para realizar la guerra agresiva contra otros paises.
					
					Si Japon que acecha la oportunidad para vengar de su derrota del pasado vuelve a tomar el camino de agresion, los paises asiaticos y el resto del mundo seran victimas de las calamidades severas, lo cual es el hecho innegable.
